item.content:encoded:
Vintage Antique Valentine’s Day Musical Postcard

Review Vintage Antique Valentine’s Day Musical Postcard – Valentines Day Cards This item is trending! Vintage Antique Valentine’s Day Musical Postcard good product Vintage Antique Valentine’s Day Musical Postcard It’s in stock and ready to ship.The musical Cupid astride the staff in this design from an antique Valentine’s Day postcard asks the recipient to "Come be my Valentine; Come sing with me my song." The original postcard is postmarked Feb 14 and while the year is not visible, it dates to before 1907. The original card was sent to Miss Evalyne Maynard of Rutherford NJ, but her shy valentine never signed a name to it. Price:$1.40

Review Vintage Antique Valentine’s Day Musical Postcard ($1.40)

item.content:encoded:
Lots more love pink photo birth announcement

Best Price! Lots more love pink photo birth announcement – Valentines Day Cards This item is trending! Lots more love pink photo birth announcement if you are looking for it, we recommend it Lots more love pink photo birth announcement See more about itSend a sweet Valentine’s Day birth announcement with this one-photo card. With a simple "lots more love" type treatment and plenty of room for custom text, this is the perfect way to introduce your newest little love to the world. The back is a matching speckled pick with room for an additional photo and more text. This design is also available as a digital birth announcement download and can be found in other colors in the collection by Lea Delaveris Design. Price:$2.11
